amendatorysection.catchline: Raptors; falconry licensee; reports required, when.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Any holder of a falconry license who acquires, receives, transfers, barters, releases, or otherwise disposes of any raptor shall submit a written report as required by the commission.

(2) The commission shall furnish forms for the reports required under this section and shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations governing the submission of such reports. Nothing in this section shall be construed to permit the possession of more raptors than permitted by section 37-499.
